message: Hi Bob, I have a unique product I think you'd be interested in. It's worth at least $10000 to me, but I'm willing to offer it to you for $15000.  Let me know what you think!

Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I understand its value to you, but given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price closer to $8000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $8000 is too far below my minimum.  I'm willing to come down to $12000 to make this work.  Let's see if we can bridge the gap.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $9500. I believe this offers a fair compromise.
Bob,  $9500 is closer, but still below my minimum. I'm willing to go down to $11000.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let's see if we can find common ground.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $10500. I believe this offers a reasonable compromise.
